entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 23. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023
